price: Limetukuka jina la Mola wako Mlezi Mwenye utukufu na ukarimu.
arabic: تَبَٰرَكَ ٱسۡمُ رَبِّكَ ذِي ٱلۡجَلَٰلِ وَٱلۡإِكۡرَامِ

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: tabāraka us'mu rabbika dhī al-jalāli wal-ik'rāmi
